subproject.corporate outcome: Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description: The major objectives are to: (i) improve knowledge and practice of HIV and Sexually Transmitted Infections (STI) preventative measures by the general adult population, youth and vulnerable population subgroups during 2005-2010: (ii) develop and expand treatment, and care and support services for people and families living with HIV/AIDS: and (iii) build the capacity of Southern Sudan HIV/AIDS Commission (SSAC), NGOs and local institutions to effectively manage and monitor HIV/AIDS programmes
subproject.title: HIV/AIDS Prevention and Care i

title: HIV/AIDS Prevention and Care in South Sudan
